name: Minor reflections of a wandering mind
name_original: Minor reflections of a wandering mind
description:
I made this as part of Game Makers Iceland Summer Jam 2018. 

At first I planned to make a game, but every evening I worked on it I had about 1-2 hours to do something and I actually just wanted to explore sort of disconnected ideas as well as interacting with systems I hadn´t used before in Unreal. 

The result is this, have fun! 

(Requires mouse and keyboard) 

WASD to move and mouse to look around. 

Other instructions provided within the game
